CustomField.description: Determines the Milestone Amount of a generated Milestone based on the total package amount provided when generating Milestones from a Product Package
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines the Milestone Amount of a generated Milestone based on the total package amount provided when generating Milestones from a Product Package. Can be 0 for a $0 Milestone. The sum of all Milestone Percents for a Product Package should equal 100.
CustomField.label: Milestone Percent
